description:
For more than 45 years, the Law Offices of Watson and Watson has been serving clients across Northern and Central Arkansas in matters ranging from real property to civil litigation to family law. We are a full-service firm where clients can expect professionalism and personal attention. We pride ourselves on providing first class service on a one-on-one basis.

There is a reason that the team at our firm has earned honors that include being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40. We go above and beyond for the people we serve. Because we have depth in our practice areas, we often oversee cases that span disciplines, such as a divorce that involves a family business and property. We also combine decades of experience here. This gives us the ability to take a case from start to finish, whether it includes negotiation or going to trial.

The practice areas at our law offices include the following:

  • Family law: Divorce and child custody
  • Personal injury: Car accidents and medical malpractice
  • Criminal defense: DUI and drug crimes
  • Estate planning: Wills and trusts
  • Real estate: Property law
  • Business law: Organization, contracts and construction
